channel.title: 2BAnnaB
channel.description: All about what it is like to be AnnaB. I'll mostly be talking about knitting, spinning, cooking, what it's like living in the UK as an American, and a little Early Modern Drama thrown in there for fun.
channel.itunes:author: AnnaB
channel.itunes:summary: All about what it is like to be AnnaB. I'll mostly be talking about knitting, spinning, cooking, what it's like living in the UK as an American, and a little Early Modern Drama thrown in there for fun.

item.title: Episode 001 - To be, or not to be, I there's the point.
item.description:
